About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

As a self-taught front-end developer, I enjoy learning new skills and coming up with solutions to interesting problems. I write code in HTML, CSS, Javascript, and React. I strive to make beautiful, mobile-first web applications with clean, re-usable code. I still have a tremendous amount to learn, but I am extremely excited to continue developing into an excellent developer and designer.
